reviewText: More filler, less massage.  I don't understand why the client must be in a hard chair sitting up, not on a massage table or chair.

This video does not cover head, neck, or shoulder massage but shows and briefly instructs a few ayurvedic oil therapies for the head and hair, along with a short ending segment on preparing the herbal oil.  Overall not really worth it.  The title of this video is wrong and probably got switched with the other film by them.
This DVD has nothing to do with Head neck and Shoulder massage.  It is about pouring oil on the head.
The fact that even though I purchased this product I can not download it to my computer is not satisfactory. It does not make it available to me as needed.
